meanings.sent1: She would peenge about having to do her chores every day.

meanings.sent3: Instead of enjoying the game, he would just peenge about the rules.

meanings.sent5: The sound of her peenging echoed through the house, irritating everyone.
meanings.sent6: He would peenge to his friends about the long lines at the store.
meanings.sent7: The cat would peenge for attention when its owner was busy.
meanings.sent8: Even the sunny weather couldn't stop her from peenging about the heat.
meanings.sent9: His peenging was so loud that it drowned out all other sounds in the room.
meanings.sent10: The peenging of the old car engine signaled trouble ahead.

meanings.sent1: He only had a peenge left in his pocket after buying lunch.
